actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To prohibit the introduction of a plastic container into interstate commerce that does not contain a marking that identifies the type of plastic resin used to produce the container, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Plastic Container Identification Act of 1991 - Prescribes labeling requirements for plastic containers in interstate commerce to indicate the type of plastic resin used to produce the container. Imposes criminal penalties for violations.

titles.title: To prohibit the introduction of a plastic container into interstate commerce that does not contain a marking that identifies the type of plastic resin used to produce the container, and for other purposes.
